  • Method Details

    • getOptionalStringValueFromTitle

      public static Optional<String> getOptionalStringValueFromTitle(String selectName, String title)
      Method to search value from a couple (selectName / title) when it may not match any value. Otherwise, prefer using getStringValueFromTitle(String, String).
      Parameters:
      selectName - : String representing the name of a string selection.
      title - : String representing the title (as displayed before translation in views) of a value among the possible ones from to selection named by selectName.
      Returns:
      an Optional String containing the value as stored in database corresponding to the given couple (selectName / title).

    • getStringValueFromTitle

      public static String getStringValueFromTitle(String selectName, String title)
      Method to search value from a couple (selectName / title) when it is certain to match a value. Otherwise, prefer using getOptionalStringValueFromTitle(String, String).
      Parameters:
      selectName - : String representing the name of a string selection.
      title - : String representing the title (as displayed before translation in views) of a value among the possible ones from to selection named by selectName.
      Returns:
      a String value as stored in database corresponding to the given couple (selectName / title).
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the couple (selectName / title) doesn't match any existing selection.

    • getOptionalTitleFromStringValue

      public static Optional<String> getOptionalTitleFromStringValue(String selectName, String value)
      Method to search title corresponding to a couple (selectName / value) when it may not match any result. Otherwise, prefer using getTitleFromStringValue(String, String).
      Parameters:
      selectName - String representing the name of a string selection.
      value - String representing the value among the possible ones from to selection named by selectName.
      Returns:
      an Optional String containing to the label as displayed (before translation) in views corresponding to given couple (selectName & value).

    • getTitleFromStringValue

      public static String getTitleFromStringValue(String selectName, String value)
      Method to search title corresponding to a couple (selectName / value) when it is certain that there is a match. Otherwise, prefer using getOptionalTitleFromStringValue(String, String).
      Parameters:
      selectName - : String representing the name of a string selection.
      value - : String representing the value among the possible ones from to selection named by selectName.
      Returns:
      the String corresponding to the label as displayed (before translation) in views corresponding to given couple (selectName & value). Can be null if no title is associated to the found selection option.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the couple (selectName / value) doesn't match any existing selection.

    • getPossibleValuesForStringSelection

      public static List<String> getPossibleValuesForStringSelection(String selectName)
      Parameters:
      selectName - : String representing the name of a string selection.
      Returns:
      a List containing all the existing values associated to the selection.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the selectName doesn't match any selection in the application.

    • getOptionalIntegerValueFromTitle

      public static Optional<Integer> getOptionalIntegerValueFromTitle(String selectName, String title)
      Method to search Integer value from a couple (selectName / title) when it may not match any value. Otherwise, prefer using getIntegerValueFromTitle(String, String).
      Parameters:
      selectName - String representing the name of an integer selection.
      title - String representing the title (as displayed before translation in views) of a value among the possible ones from to selection named by selectName.
      Returns:
      an Optional Integer containing the value as stored in database corresponding to the given couple (selectName / title).

    • getIntegerValueFromTitle

      public static Integer getIntegerValueFromTitle(String selectName, String title)
      Method to search value from a couple (selectName / title) when it is certain to match a value. Otherwise, prefer using getOptionalIntegerValueFromTitle(String, String).
      Parameters:
      selectName - : String representing the name of an integer selection.
      title - : String representing the title (as displayed before translation in views) of a value among the possible ones from to selection named by selectName.
      Returns:
      Integer value as stored in database corresponding to the given couple (selectName / title).
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the couple (selectName / title) doesn't match any existing selection.
      IllegalArgumentException - if the couple (selectName / title) match a selection with non-numeric values.

    • getOptionalTitleFromIntegerValue

      public static Optional<String> getOptionalTitleFromIntegerValue(String selectName, Integer value)
      Method to search title corresponding to a couple (selectName / value) when it may not match any result. Otherwise, prefer using getTitleFromIntegerValue(String, Integer).
      Parameters:
      selectName - : String representing the name of an integer selection.
      value - : Integer representing the value among the possible ones from to selection named by selectName.
      Returns:
      an Optional String containing to the label as displayed (before translation) in views corresponding to given couple (selectName & value).

    • getTitleFromIntegerValue

      public static String getTitleFromIntegerValue(String selectName, Integer value)
      Method to search title corresponding to a couple (selectName / value) when it is certain that there is a match. Otherwise, prefer using getOptionalTitleFromIntegerValue(String, Integer)
      Parameters:
      selectName - String representing the name of an integer selection.
      value - String representing the value among the possible ones from to selection named by selectName.
      Returns:
      the String corresponding to the label as displayed (before translation) in views corresponding to given couple (selectName & value).
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the couple (selectName / value) doesn't match any existing selection.

    • getPossibleValuesForIntegerSelection

      public static List<Integer> getPossibleValuesForIntegerSelection(String selectName)
      Parameters:
      selectName - : String representing the name of an integer selection.
      Returns:
      a List containing all the existing values cast as Integer associated to the selection.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the selectName doesn't match any selection in the application.

      Or if the selectName match a non-integer selection.
